articles.description: Les Rouges should take pride in their achievements over the last few years. It’s a shame that mistakes on and off the pitch held them back
articles.content:
The softly spoken Fifa translator paused for a moment. But she held her nerve. In the end, she said as she relayed man-of-the-match Andrej Kramarics words, Croatia demonstrated who effd whom.

articles.description: It is not very often that England get bullied quite like they did at Twickenham on Saturday against the Springboks...
articles.content:
It is not very often that England get bullied quite like they did at Twickenham on Saturday against the Springboks.
